game.name: Snowtopia: Ski Resort Builder
game.shortDescription: 이상적인 스키 리조트를 건설하세요. 이용객의 욕구를 충족하세요. 시설을 개선하세요. 누구나 따뜻하게 맞아 주는 Snowtopia의 겨울 세계에 어서 오세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your ideal ski resort. Keep skiers smiling with fresh pistes and fine facilities. Ski, build and chill in the wintry world of Snowtopia where everyone is welcome!

reviewHighlights.text: The game is good, the graphics and animations are good. But shortly after playing the tutorial and starting another game, the mechanics would not fix...
Amazing fun to build and expand a ski resort of your own and great fun for anyone who likes skiing like myself. I only have one negative to say about...
